categories: Category:Articles with an excess of redlinks

nodes.text: "Directing" is the first episode of Disney Gallery: The Mandalorian, a docuseries on the production of the Disney+ television series The Mandalorian. The episode focuses on the episodic directors of the show and their experiences working on Star Wars. The episode aired on May 4, 2020 on Disney+.
Join Jon Favreau and season one's directors as they pull back the curtain on The Mandalorian.
